entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
